title: Still no draven minion icon?
body: About a week ago I have sent and icon to my friend and he sent me one back. I still haven't received my draven minion icon. Proof https://gyazo.com/bedbfa195ac86f5aa2105bcac8ac7026

replies.body: You'll receive the icon on or before April 25th. Hang tight! :)

Hey Katey, do we get both at the same time, or are they distributed separately? I got my minion one when I logged in today, but I didn't get the Gold Draven Statue icon from the legendary Draven chest.
I believe there are two different scripts that are handing these out, so you may not get both at the same time.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=UsmKmGFb,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-04-20T17:17:07.915+0000)
>
> I believe there are two different scripts that are handing these out, so you may not get both at the same time.

Wow reported for scripting
